reviewText:
Unfortunately, DVD which delivered to me has some falults.
Both image and sound are always breaking up around specific scene (1h 27min).
The quality of the product was good and the delivery was quick enough.

i watched this movie over 20 years ago and loved it... and have been looking to buy a copy  ever since then! it is the sweetest... funniest and saddest movie i have ever watched... Jack Lemmon and Marcellon Mastrianni were a wonderful  combination and i can not say enough good things about this movie ... if you love Italy you will love this... even the soundtrack is excellent. i give it a 4 star and a 2 hankerchief rating

I have loved this movie since I first saw it in the theater in the 80s.  Two great actors, set (unusually) in Naples, interesting story with a characteristic Neapolitan fascination with death and with life, friendship, romance, family, and fantasy.  There is a nice music score behind it all.  Unfortunately, it is not readily available as a DVD that will play in the US.  I have a VHS copy, and recently watched it as a free offering on Kindle through Amazon Prime.  Perhaps the title, but it has never gotten the attention it deserves.
all Italian, with no subtitles .... Jack Lemmon in Italian, NA!
it is one of the best movies I have ever seen - really really great movie -
